content.content: hire the best NFT artists to make genesis NFTs for GTC holders
I like that idea!  Would connect Gitcoin also more to the NFT space.
Genesis idea ，could please launch a discord or something workpalace for this?

At ENS(Ethereum Name Service) we are doing exactly that. We commissioned @pplpleasr(known for her “x*y=k” NFT charity auction) and announced to do NFT giveaway to all ENS users who set reverse record to your ETH address (so that your .eth name shows up in apps like uniswap, opensea, etherscan, etc).    Medium – 4 May 21    Celebrating ENS’s 4th Anniversary with an Original Pplpleasr NFT Giveaway ENS launched four years ago today!  Reading time: 4 min read       We also turned this opportunity to onboard our users into governance participation by using https://snapshot.page as NFT giveaway application and also let users decide how many copies to mint (btw, there is 1 more week before the deadline). For GTC airdrop, it may be interesting to have a shortlist of NFT artists and make snapshot voting to decide who to commission as snapshot voting.
I have a few artists and djs who would like to get involved if there is anything here for them!
this very good idea. always support grow up team together
That’s an idea i think we can all get behind!
Awesome idea! Would the community be voting for which digital artists that get invited?
I am thinking about creating a Gitcoin virtual idol.
Nice idea! Looking forward to the NFT !
Love this idea - We will see what we can do  Stay tuned!
That would be awesome. Looking forward to the outcome!
Looking forward to actualisation of this awesome idea.

love it great read thanks for the catch up really needed it

i hope they make nft and air drops a little more user friendly for the people who are new to all of this as myself… sometime after spending 1 to 2 hours doing all the thing to get in on an airdrop and nothing comes out of it its really heart breaking…lol but fr theres noithing worse than putting in the work hoping for a great ending and it turns out to be a dud you know?

yes 100 percent agree but the only thing i wish could be worked on is a better way of getting the info out to people a better user friendly way of spreading the word and applying for them would be great…
any chance we could get an artist to make a GitCoin theme song then distribute that file as an exclusive GTC holder nft?
good idea!!! GTC to the moon!!!
i do i go about getting gitcoin tokens so i could be eligible for a potential drop?
Discord group? Yes I believe this A+
very nice idea, can’t wait get these NFT’s

Hey. Is this about the ENS NFT airdrop? Would love to know what part you especially found hard. We had it for over one month so there was plenty of time to participate. We tasked users to have .eth name and have reverse record set which may not be the easiest things to do if you are new to Ethereum but I do think it’s part of the learning curve. Having said that we welcome any suggestion to improve the entire process.

Just had a follow up analysis of our NFT airdrop https://twitter.com/makoto_inoue/status/1402557031446364162 I highly recommend that we drop to people who did certain tasks (in our case, 1: have .eth ENS name, 2: set reverse record, then 3 participate in snapshot governance) rather than doing blanket  airdropping. In case of GTC holders, what would be the actions we want to encourage GTC holders do?
Cool Idea , will follow it    and support it
Great. Thanks for give airdrops to someone

I like the idea, but maybe have a way of showing authenticity of the nft( a kind of watermark) , as when it hits the market (opensea, rarible etc ) you will have people copying the nfts to defraud and gain.

Not sure if it’s possible or even necessary. People can copy the NFT image asset with a watermark. The usual way to check the authenticity in NFT in general is to check who issued the NFT so issuing under gitcoin.eth ENS name (or ETH address they use for other gitcoin related stuff) could be the only solution.

Agree. The issue i’ve seen in the past, is when the nfts swap hands, people find it hard to trace the ownership back to the original creation address (checking authenticity). Not a tough thing to learn how to do, but to the beginners it can cause issues. ENS address may help as it takes the mystery of the alpha numeric address out of the equation, ill be honest not seen an example of this yet on an nft marketplace - interested to see if this sorts these issues out .
that will be so cool

It is a really good idea, and please submit proposal it with following template.     Gitcoin Community Proposal (GCP) Template 📜 Proposal Discussion       This post will walk through a proposed format for making a governance proposal on Gitcoin.  A Gitcoin Community Proposal (GCP) is a formal mechanism for making decisions about how our community grows. Key points to keep in mind include:    Title - Post each proposal with a clear title around its objective. This will look as follows: [Proposal] - XXXXXX  Ordering - Please do not assign a number to your GCP. The ordering of the proposal will be assigned by community moderators.  Detail - While we …     After receiving input from at leaset 5 stewards, it will move to vote in Sanpshot. Another good news is Gitcoin meme contest finished(in Discord meme channel) last week, so we will have best NFT for our community. Enjoy it.
